message: Welcome! I'm offering a unique product at a special price of $1000000. Given the current market value and considering the product's condition, I believe it offers great value. With a proven track record of quality in my sales, you can trust in the integrity of this offering. Please consider this investment opportunity carefully.
I'd like to pass on this one. I'd like to know more about your sales record and the quality of your products before making a decision.
